citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:00 pm on
11/17/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door. The licensee was not available to
facilitate an inspection and her spouse was unable to come home from work to accompany APHIS Officials. Failure to
provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure
to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:00 pm on 
11/17/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door. The licensee was not available to 
facilitate an inspection and her spouse was unable to come home from work to accompany APHIS Officials. Failure to 
provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure 
to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
